title: mayil vahananE mAlOn
sahitya:
mayil vAhananE mAlOn maruganE kayilaiyOn maganE kava SaNmukhanE


anupallavi

  mayilOr mEvum vaDivElavanE mayili maNALaNE puLLI kaLabha kola


caraNam    umaiyavaL magizhndiDum maindanE kandanE Om enum mantirattAl oru jnyAna paNDitanE
sharavaNabhavanE guruparanE guhanE muruga perumanE muttayyanE aruNagiri vaLar
